/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a bustling city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
